title: System
description: Information about a specific syatem accessed by DOGE staff

id.description: An ID for the system (usually an acronym)

type.description: What type of system is this?
type.$comment: Internal = used mainly inside a single agency (can be public); SaaS is a tool like Google/Salesforce (enterprise, used at a single agency); SSP is a Shared Service Provider like GrantSolutions

agency.description: Can be a single agency or an array of agencies affected/involved in the event

comment.description: For comments and notes on this system

category.description: Specific categories of systems that DOGE seem to be interested in

population.description: A short description of what people's records are in the system

risk.description: A short description of the date risks associated with DOGE accessing the system

link.description: A link to an overview of the system

pia.description: A URL linking to the Privacy Impact Assessment for the system

sorn.description: A URL linking to a single SORN for the system if applicable (but read PIA for SORNs)

serves.description: For SaaS tools, a list of agencies that use it as a service
